member.summary: SharpAI server pull model response message.

member.summary: Current status of the pull operation. Examples: "pulling manifest", "pulling model", "writing manifest", "success"

member.summary: Number of bytes downloaded.

member.name: P:SharpAI.Sdk.Models.SharpAIPullModelResponse.Percent
member.summary: Download progress as a decimal (0.0 to 1.0).

member.name: P:SharpAI.Sdk.Models.SharpAIPullModelResponse.Error
member.summary: Error message if the pull operation failed.

member.name: M:SharpAI.Sdk.Models.SharpAIPullModelResponse.GetProgressPercentage
member.summary: Gets the download progress as a percentage (0-100).
member.returns: Progress percentage (0-100), or null if data unavailable.

member.name: M:SharpAI.Sdk.Models.SharpAIPullModelResponse.GetFormattedProgress
member.summary: Gets a formatted progress string.

member.summary: Checks if the operation is complete.
member.returns: True if the status indicates completion.

member.name: M:SharpAI.Sdk.Models.SharpAIPullModelResponse.HasError
member.summary: Checks if the operation has failed.

member.summary: Formats bytes into human-readable format.
